00030 #ifndef RIGID_ALIGN_WITH_DATASET_MATCH_PRINTS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00031 #define RIGID_ALIGN_WITH_DATASET_MATCH_PRINTS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00032 
00033 #include <ScoreMapBase.H>
00034 
00035 namespace SimSite3D{
00036 
00037 class RigidAlignWithDsetMP : public rigid_align_t{
00038 public:
00039   RigidAlignWithDsetMP() : rigid_align_t()
00040   { ; }
00041 
00042   RigidAlignWithDsetMP(const RigidAlignWithDsetMP& other) : rigid_align_t(other)
00043   {
00044     do_copy(other);
00045   }
00046 
00047   const RigidAlignWithDsetMP&
00048   operator=(const RigidAlignWithDsetMP& other)
00049   {
00050     if(&other != this){
00051       do_copy(other);
00052       rigid_align_t::operator=(other);
00053     }
00054     return *this;
00055   }
00056 
00057   virtual ~RigidAlignWithDsetMP()
00058   { ; }
00059 
00060   virtual void
00061   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out, const uint orient_num,
00062                      const bool wrote_ligs, const std::string& ext_SF_id_in,
00063                      const std::string& struct_id,
00064                      const std::string& lig_id) const
00065   {
00066     // First write the base class's score line
00067     rigid_align_t::write_score_fields(out, orient_num, wrote_ligs, ext_SF_id_in,
00068                                       struct_id, lig_id);
00069     std::vector<bool>::const_iterator mp;
00070     for(mp = dataset_mp.begin(); mp < dataset_mp.end(); ++mp)
00071       out << (*mp ? "1" : "0");
00072     out << "|";
00073   }
00074 
00075   virtual void
00076   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out) const
00077   {
00078     rigid_align_t::write_score_fields(out);
00079     std::vector<bool>::const_iterator mp;
00080     for(mp = dataset_mp.begin(); mp < dataset_mp.end(); ++mp)
00081       out << (*mp ? "1" : "0");
00082     out << "|";
00083   }
00084 
00085   virtual void
00086   get_score_field_labels(std::vector<std::string> *fields,
00087                          const bool normalize_score) const
00088   {
00089     rigid_align_t::get_score_field_labels(fields, normalize_score);
00090     fields->push_back("Dataset site point matchprint");
00091   }
00092  
00093 
00094   std::vector<bool> dataset_mp; 
00095 private:
00096 
00097   void
00098   do_copy(const RigidAlignWithDsetMP& other)
00099   {
00100     dataset_mp = other.dataset_mp; 
00101   }
00102 
00103 };
00104 }
00105 #endif
